title: Introduction to Python Programming

description: Master the essentials of front-end web development using JavaScript.

description: Explore the world of data science and analytics with Python and libraries like NumPy and Pandas.

title: Financial Literacy
description: Learn the basics of personal finance, including budgeting, investing, and retirement planning.
